description.default:
Channelling the forces of spirit and ice, Rime conjures powerful spells to decimate her foes.

Rime is a Spellcasting Damage Dealer with Builder/Spender Mechanics. She excels at focusing down the biggest threat from a distance.

Many of Rime’s abilities fill an Anima Bar to deal spikes of damage and generate Winter Orbs.

She uses Winter Orbs to cast dangerous spells.

biography.default:
The last of her tribe, Rime lived in solitude until the rise of new evils forced her from her hermitage.

The Harbinger enacts the will of the patron spirit of winter. Rime's power is a cursed gift she uses to cleanse corruption and bring quiet peace to those already fated to die.

description.default:
Each tick of <rt.absorb>Freezing Torrent</> reduces the cooldown of <rt.absorb>Bursting Ice</> by 0.3 seconds.

Each time you cast <rt.absorb>Cold Snap</> the cooldown of <rt.absorb>Freezing Torrent</> is reduced by 1.5 seconds.

While <rt.absorb>Bursting Ice</> is active on an enemy you gain <rt.effect>Winter's Embrace</>, causing you to deal <rt.warning>20% more damage</>.

<rt.effect>Winter's Embrace</> does not affect <rt.absorb>Bursting Ice</>.

Your <rt.absorb>Cold Snap</> ability grants you 1 stack of <rt.effect>Glacial Assault</>. Once you have 4 stacks of <rt.effect>Glacial Assault</>, your next <rt.absorb>Glacial Blast</> is <bold>instant cast</>, deals <rt.warning>40% more damage</> and has <rt.mana>no cost</>.
When your <rt.absorb>Frost Bolt</> deals damage to an enemy, it triggers a single pulse of <rt.absorb>Bursting Ice</> and <rt.mana>generates 2 additional Anima</>.
Your <rt.absorb>Freezing Torrent</> duration is increased by 0.8 seconds.
Your <rt.absorb>Flight of the Navir</> ability grants 2 charges of <rt.absorb>Cold Snap</>.

Your <rt.absorb>Cold Snap</> grants you <rt.effect>Icy Flow</> for 8 seconds, reducing the cast time of your next <rt.absorb>Glacial Blast</> by 0.5 seconds or reducing the impact delay of your next <rt.absorb>Ice Comet</> by 0.5 seconds.

Both abilities gain <rt.warning>+25% increased critical strike chance</> when consuming a stack of <rt.effect>Icy Flow</>.

You can have up to 2 stacks of <rt.effect>Icy Flow</>.
Your <rt.absorb>Ice Comet</> has a 15% chance to strike twice, and a 7% chance to strike three times.

Each hit of <rt.absorb>Freezing Torrent</> infuses the target with <rt.effect>Coalescing Frost</> for 3 seconds. Once it expires, the afflicted enemy releases a pulse of frost damage in an area around them, dealing <rt.warning>43% Intellect</> damage for each stack of <rt.effect>Coalescing Frost</> that was infused.

<rt.absorb>Freezing Torrent</> critical strikes have a 50% chance to apply 2 stacks of <rt.effect>Coalescing Frost</>.
Your <rt.absorb>Frost Ward</> duration is <rt.bold>increased to 8 seconds</>, and while it is active you <rt.heal>heal for 35% of all damage you deal</>.
Your <rt.absorb>Glacial Blast</> deals <rt.warning>40% more damage</> but its cast time is increased by 0.5 seconds.
You take <rt.bold>10% reduced magic damage</>.

For each <rt.mana>Anima</> you generate while your <rt.absorb>Ice Blitz</> is active, you conjure <bold>1 Frost Swallow</> to attack your target.

The duration of <rt.absorb>Ice Blitz</> is extended by 0.2 seconds each time a <rt.absorb>Frost Swallow</> hits an enemy.

Each time you generate <rt.mana>Winter Orbs</>, you have a 17% chance to gain  <rt.effect>Frostweaver's Wrath</> for 12 seconds, causing the next <rt.absorb>Glacial Blast</> or <rt.absorb>Ice Comet</> that deals damage to have <rt.warning>100% additional critical strike chance</>.

<rt.warning>GRIEVOUS CRITICAL STRIKE</>
Any critical strike chance you have beyond 100% causes a <rt.warning>grievous critical strike</>. <rt.warning>Grievous critical strikes</> increase the base damage of the hit by an amount equal to the overflowing critical strike chance.

Each time you cast an ability you have a chance to gain <rt.effect>Soulfrost Torrent</> for 18 seconds, causing your next <rt.absorb>Freezing Torrent</> to have 40% increased tick rate and <rt.warning>+100% increased critical strike chance</>. (1.5 PPM)

<rt.warning>GRIEVOUS CRITICAL STRIKE</>
Any critical strike chance you have beyond 100% causes a <rt.warning>grievous critical strike</>. <rt.warning>Grievous critical strikes</> increase the base damage of the hit by an amount equal to the overflowing critical strike chance.
The power of your <rt.warning>critical strikes is increased by 10%</>.
You take <rt.bold>10% reduced area of effect damage</>.
The cooldown of <rt.absorb>Ice Blitz</>, <rt.absorb>Flight of the Navir</> & <rt.absorb>Winter's Blessing</> is reduced by 0.3 seconds for each <rt.mana>Winter's Orb</> you spend.
Your <rt.absorb>Cold Snap</> conjures an additional wave of <rt.absorb>3 Frost Swallows</> in waves.
Your <bold>Bursting Ice</> damage is increased by 30%.
When <bold>Bursting Ice</> deals damage to a single target it generates 2 additional Anima per tick.
Your <bold>Freezing Torrent</> deals 20% increased damage.
Your <bold>Movement Speed</> is increased by 20%
Your <rt.absorb>Glacial Blast</> has 20% increased critical strike chance.
Your <rt.absorb>Ice Blitz</> increases all damage you deal by an additional 10%.
While <rt.absorb>Bursting Ice</> is active on an enemy, you gain 20% Haste.

Your critical strikes have a chance to cause your next <rt.absorb>Freezing Torrent</> within 12 seconds to have 100% increased tick rate and deal 100% increased damage.

(1.5 PPM)

Your <rt.absorb>Cold Snap</> critical strikes conjure <bold>3 Frost Swalllows</> to instantly attack your enemies.

Additionally, your <rt.absorb>Cold Snap</> and <rt.absorb>Freezing Torrent</> damage has a 15% chance to conjure <bold>1 Frost Swalllow</>.
